name: obsidian-samepage
description: Official Obsidian client into the inter-TFT-protocol

scripts.start: samepage dev --format cjs --external obsidian --include manifest.json --include node_modules/samepage/samepage.css --mirror $HOME/Documents/obsidian/obsidian-vargas/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-samepage --css styles
scripts.test: samepage test --format cjs --external obsidian --include manifest.json --include node_modules/samepage/samepage.css --mirror $HOME/Documents/obsidian/obsidian-vargas/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-samepage --css styles

author: dvargas92495 <dvargas92495@gmail.com>
